title: Discrete Choice Experiment
description: A discrete choice experiment is an approach that helps us to understand the most important parts of our dementia narrative intervention. It helps us to ensure that concentrate on building the most important features.

title: Study: What narratives are important to you?
description: We've opened a quick 10 minute survey. If you have been or are impacted by dementia we would appreciate it if you would take part.

title: Focus Group Discussion
description: Join us for an in-depth discussion about your experiences with dementia narratives. This session will help shape our research direction.

title: Prototype: test our latest prototype
description: Provide feedback on the latest version of the LEND intervention (released on 8th August 2025).
